email_confirmation_subject: Welcome on Inventaire.io!! Here is the link to confirm your email address
email_confirmation_paragraph: Please, visit this link so that we can use your email address in the future, knowing it's really yours (to help you reset your password for instance).
friendship_request_subject: %{username} invites you to connect your inventories!
friendship_request_button: go to %{username}'s inventory to accepts the invitation
you_are_welcome_to_reply: **you are very welcome to reply to this email** for any question or feedback
get_involved: Think you can contribute to make Inventaire better? Get involved!!
contribution_ideas: Ask to be added to the [project development board](https://trello.com/b/0lKcsZDj/inventaire-community), join the [translation team](https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/inventaire/), post an [issue on github](https://github.com/maxlath/inventaire/issues), or simply start a discussion by answering this email!
stop_email_notifications: [Stop email notifications](mailto:hello@inventaire.io?subject=Stop notifications&body=Hi, Inventaire is awesome, you really rock!! That said, I don't want to receive Inventaire's emails any more, could you do that? Love, %{username})
transactions_tracking: Transactions tracking (know where your book is)
reset_password_paragraph:
We received a request to reset the password for your account, **%{username}**.
If you made this request, click the button below. If you didn't make this request, you can ignore this email.
